name: Legacy of the Star Knight -Bakin DEMO
name_original: Legacy of the Star Knight -Bakin DEMO
description:
My first ever solo game dev project ported to RPG Bakin.  Been working on this for about 2 months and it really shows. 

-Missing sound effects

-Wonky camera work

-Depth of field out of focus

I plan to see this one to completion, no matter how long it takes.  Only three locales are playable.  Please give it a try and tell me what you think?
